title: Values of counts after traversing theList

content.question: theList <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> [-2, -1, 0, 1, 2]count1 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0count2 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0FOR EACH value IN theList{IF(value > 0){count1 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count1 + 1}ELSE{count2 <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> count2 + 1}}What are the values of count1 and count2 as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
